1.title: COMIC BOOK VILLAINY

2.title: "P"RODUCE
clues: A plum that's suffering from dehydration

3.title: WORLD CAPITALS

4.title: AVATAR
clues: "Avatar" comes from a word meaning "descent" in this ancient language of Hinduism
Matsya, the first avatar of Vishnu, saved the world from a flood; he's often depicted as half man, half this

Like Achilles, Krishna, an avatar of Vishnu, dies when he's shot in this, his only vulnerable spot
